name: Flick Quarterback 18
description:
BECOME A FOOTBALL LEGEND – Join The New Season Today!

CREATE YOUR PLAYER

Choose from over 32 teams and put yourself in the team, with a variety character options in our character creator.

FLICK, SWIPE AND TAP YOUR WAY TO THE BIG GAME

Take control with intuitive flick controls, throwing and controlling the ball in-air entirely with the revolutionary control scheme.

BECOME THE MVP

Unlock boosts, player upgrades, stadium fireworks and even new game modes as you become the MVP of the game.

BRING THE FANS

Upgrade your stadium to bring in more and more players – and gain XP while you do it!

FULL FAT are industry-leaders with over 20 years of experience in providing mobile gaming experiences on the go for players of all ages to enjoy!
